item.title: Read: “Django 1.1 Testing and Debugging”, by Karen M. Tracey
item.description: Packt Publishing sent me a copy of `Django 1.

item.title: Read: “Grok 1.0 Web Development”, by Carlos de la Guardia
item.description: A month and a half ago I posted a pre-review of `Grok 1.

item.title: Read: “Fordlandia”, by Greg Grandin
item.description: Fordlandia chronicles the rise and fall of eponymous rubber plantation established by Henry Ford in Brazil in 1927.
